title: Top Supermarket Clerk
description: Five supermarket employees compete to determine who will be Top Supermarket Clerk.
altHero: Benjamin in the supermarket aisle holding a price gun
alt1: Lucie ringing up some milk at the register
alt2: the clerks in a meat freezer wearing thick jackets and gloves
alt3: Dominic has spilled ice cream all over the conveyor belt
alt4: Jeff guiding a shopper with a full cart
